answerText: Ko Un[10] Ko Un wrote his poetry and prose in this Asian language-isolate using the native Hangul script.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 8 | 7 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote The Three Way Tavern, and Robert Hass wrote an introduction to a collection this man wrote while imprisoned, Ten Thousand Lives. [10] Name this contemporary poet and Nobel contender who wrote "Arrows" in his collection The Sound of My Waves.
